songs.title: Stereo Soldier
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Jade & (All) & Perrie]
Boy step a little closer
Cause I don’t think you heard these words before (Yeah)
Lay me left and rock me right, baby lift me up so high
Take me to another world (Yea-Yeah)
Cause no one else will do, woo
Don’t wanna be by myself, I wanna be dancing with you

[Chorus: All]
Cause you're my stereo, stereo, stereo soldier, oh oh
My stereo, stereo, stereo soldier, oh oh
All I need is the beat in my feet, let me lose control, oh oh
Give me love, give me now, take my heart, baby take my soul, right, left

[Verse 2: Leigh-Anne & (Jesy + All)]
Run the beat and blow my speakers
And make feel me like I'm the only girl (Yeah)
The way we move is so in time, on the real, got the skills to blow my mind
They don’t make them like ya no more (Yea-Yeah)
(I'm in heaven now, so in love
Lay your weapons down and turn it up, up up up)

[Chorus: All]
And be my stereo, stereo, stereo soldier, oh oh
My stereo, stereo, stereo soldier, oh oh
All I need is the beat in my feet, let me lose control, oh oh
Give me love, give me now, take my heart, baby take my soul, right, left, go!

[Bridge: Jesy & Perrie]
Can you save me? Can you set me free?
Cause I need to feel alive, oh, we have to survive
Cause you changed me and now I believe
And I need to feel alive, oh, we have to survive

[Chorus: All & (Jade)]
Stereo, stereo, stereo soldier, oh oh
My stereo, stereo, stereo soldier, oh oh
All I need is the beat in my feet, let me lose control, oh oh (Wanna lose control)
Give me love, give me now, take my heart, baby take my soul, right, left
